website_summaries.verdict: A simple comforter set that includes all of the bedding you need. Ideal for college dorms.
pros: Brushed microfiber material is incredibly soft and ideal for those with allergies or pets
Includes comforter, fitted and flat sheets, and 4 pillowcases
Fitted sheets are true to size and stay easily in place
cons: Set includes only pillow cases and no decorative pillow shams

customer_reviews.title: Read the entire description of what your sre getting.
customer_reviews.text: The one advertisement for this particular product says 7 piece, but the picture actually shows 9 pieces. I was a bit disappointed to not get the 2 pillow shams. Usually a set is 2 pillow cases and 2 pillow shams. This one has 4 pillow cases and 0 pillow shams. Make sure you scroll thr entire way through so you know what your are getting. Other that that, I like the product.
customer_reviews.author: jacquelyn m al marzouqi

customer_reviews.title: Not Consistent
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a grey comforter and a navy one for my twin boys. The grey one came as described with a 4 piece sheet set. The Navy one came with a 3 piece sheet set that wasn't even the same brand. I got online and a customer service rep was happy to refund my shipping and pay for free shipping on a new set. I planned on returning the Navy set, but hadn't made it to UPS yet when the other arrived. I still received non matching sheets, and they were even a different thread count!! I plan to return all three!
customer_reviews.author: taylabalad

customer_reviews.title: Looks better in person
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised when these came how soft and durable they feel. I really feel like I got great quality linens for the money. They are simple and beautiful, better than I expected. I usually only buy Egyptian cotton sheets or high thread count for myself but these feel just like my luxury sheets. Will be proud to put my guests in the room with them.
customer_reviews.author: Aly Fish

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable sheets I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I normally don’t write reviews, but these sheets are phenomenal. My old sheets were wearing down and I didn’t realize it but this was messing with my sleep quality. My first night using them, I slept better than I had in years. They are extremely comfortable, and some of the softest sheets I’ve ever laid on. Highly reccomend them!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Baugh

customer_reviews.text: So I love the color the sheets are so soft it was perfect. I WAITED a week to put them on because I was sick there was thread on the comforter already coming out the comforter. The sheets are great but the comforter is not and I'm sad because I loved it I covered it with a fur throw. So the sheets are great the color and love how many pieces
customer_reviews.author: Leilani Sims-Guillory

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, when you get the right size.
customer_reviews.text: I was sent the wrong size! First go around I got a twin when ordered a Full. In the process of returning the twin set, but we reordered and finally got the right size. The material is very soft and cozy. The comforter feels more cotton-y than down alternative to me, but then again that could just be me. Either way, no complaints with quality.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate color representation
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this set because the quality was not great and the colors between the comforter and sheet set are not the same. Close enough if you don't care too much but a hue or two different. This would be a great set for someone on a tight budget or sending your kid off to college. I didn't foresee it holding up to use very long and did not like the thread count quality. All in all, I guess this set depends on how picky you are.
customer_reviews.author: Shonna Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Grandson he just got his first big boy bed and my Daughter in Law said he loves it, She said it washes well and it’s so soft. Just wish it would of came with a pillow sham or give you the option to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Rose M. Whittington

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bedding set for my son's bed. The quality is very poor. Stitching is frayed all over the comforter. I'm almost afraid to wash it as it seems like it will fall apart. The sheet set came with two different pillow cases, one matched the sheets and the other did not. I will not be purchasing this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Keir James

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Trash
customer_reviews.text: I just bought 2 sets of these for my boy's beds. First thing I do is wash them before I use them. So I followed the directions on how to wash them. Biggest mistake ever! The stuffing inside of the blanket detached through the whole comforter (on both) and they were all clumped together (in their individual sewn in square because it has a quilted pattern). I am so disappointed because this bedding was no that cheap so I expected better quality. I will say the sheets and the pillow cases are just fine. Pre-Warning: Everything looks beautiful when you take it out of the bag until you wash it. #fail
customer_reviews.author: Sabreezy Aint Easy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set for the price & good quality
customer_reviews.text: This comforter set is great for the price!! The sheets are soft and they even have the elastic bands on the fitted sheet that keep it in place. The color was exactly what I ordered and expected. The pillow cases have little flaps on one side on the end to tuck around the pillow. The comforter is not very thick, but for the price I want expecting it to be. It's a perfect set if you need something new, good quality at a good price for 5 pieces!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Comforter is disappointing, but not bad for price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a king and it basically only fits over the top of the bed and doesn’t hang over. It’s also extremely thin, which I guess is good for the summer but wondering what winter will feel like. The sheets are very soft but the comforter was disappointing. Overall, for the price, I’m ok with it but will definitely be searching for a different comforter.
customer_reviews.author: S. Obie

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the white set for our guest room and I was very surprised how great the quality was based on the lower price. The sheets are so silky smooth and the comforter is heavy enough in the winter with another blanket and by itself in the warmer months. We washed everything and nothing ripped or fallen apart. Believe the hype that this is a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brianne Ross

customer_reviews.title: great low priced product.
customer_reviews.text: these sheets and pillowcases are made of a very comfortable fabric. I can't rate them for durability because we've only had them for about a month, but so far so good
customer_reviews.author: J. CHERNAK

customer_reviews.title: If I could rate it ZERO stars I would! Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: The worst bed linens I have ever used! Sheets were itchy and felt like recycled plastic even after several washings with plenty of fabric softener. Fitted sheet was WAY too small, and the elastic ripped out of it. I ended up buying a different sheet set and throwing this stuff away. Only thing worth keeping was the comforter. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Comforter and Sheet Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality comforter that is warm without being heavy. It is well stitched and the full size is a perfect fit. The sheet and 4 pillowcases that come with it are velvety soft and also of good quality. They have deep pockets on all sides. I am very satisfied with this set.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Came torn, fell apart after one wash
customer_reviews.text: This set is perfect in every way, except it isn't made well, and lacks in durability. I noticed loose threading as soon as it came out of the bag, and after the initial wash, an entire corner stitching came out, so there is a big hole on the fitted sheet. The comforter has loose threading as well. Only a matter of time before that comes undone. Not sure i want a replacement, i'm sure quality is an issue with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: JAC1215

customer_reviews.title: Mixed Review
customer_reviews.text: The color was not as pictured. The color said "sage" and the picture showed as a light taupe, but the reality was a pea soup color. I guess I think of sage as a light grey-green, but there was no grey in this color. Also, I wondered whether such big squares in the quilt with a light filling would wash without lumping. I am returning the item and did not wash it, so I can't say for sure about that. The material was as soft as described and although the fabric would wrinkle, it would also very easily be smoothed out with my hand on the made-up bed.
customer_reviews.author: Ranny

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is, you get what you pay for tho it was on sale original price 74.99 I paid 35. The blanket is the only piece that's halfway ok, sheets and pillow cases are junk, thread count has to be below what was stated feels like card board and the cases weren't sewn all the way so it looks like its ripped....total waste of money, very cheaply made....pass them by or regret it
customer_reviews.author: Happy50

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very soft! I love how the fitted sheet has bands to help it stay on the bed! The pillow cases were nice, and the comforter was soft. The colour was even through out, but the grey has a greenish tint to it. To be fair, I have a lot of grey in my room, and not all greys are the same. Overall, I am please with my purchase and plan to get the black set.
customer_reviews.author: questionnottheuser

customer_reviews.title: Not made well for washing
customer_reviews.text: Loved it until I washed it. I washed it eactly how directed. I have a great large washer and it tore on the seam on first wash! I even wash other people’s comforters in my family because my washer is awesome and have never had this happen before. Very sad :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems poorly made
customer_reviews.text: 1. Filling was coming out out the comforter straight out of the package. 2. I guess a couple stray strands of string here and there, I guess is okay. The comforter, fitted sheet an sheet were covered in them all colors. 3. The comforter and sheet also had many spots were the dye had not taken or lightly taken. 4. It just seems cheap quality 5. Like how the texture feels that’s about it.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Soft & lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: I have NO complaints about it. I bought this for my daughters bed. It’s soft and lightweight and doesn’t wrinkle to the point where my ocd kicks in. I actually like the texture so much I’m going to buy these for my bed. They’re not super soft but they’re soft enough for me. The bed is is twin. I bought twin XL. It arrived with two pillow cases, the bedsheet blanket, the comforter, and the one that hugs the bed. I hope that helps, lol
customer_reviews.author: Momma Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My sons bed looks good with this set ! He likes it and I like it myself! Perfect for a twin bed right color blue ! Wash’s well dry’s well ! Looks new after washing it unlike some other ones wash one time color fades looks old! Soft comfortable and he wants another set in a different color so I’m sure I will be ordering again! Packaged well came on time ! Would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Priced higher than a comparable product at WalMart
customer_reviews.text: Priced higher than a comparable product at WalMart, and delivery took a ridiculous 3 WEEKS! I had to go to WalMart in the interim because I needed SOMETHING for my guests. I'd return these but it's not worth the hassle. The whole experience was frustrating because it went out TEN days AFTER order and USPS was in no hurry either, as reflected by all of the tracking info. I do NOT recommend. I should have cancelled it.
customer_reviews.author: p  m

customer_reviews.title: I love love these sheets best ones I ever had
customer_reviews.text: By far the best sheets I've ever owned I have 2 sets and fighting the urge to buy one in every color proof positive that more expensive the better the product these are excellent quality at a low cost I mean try them if you don't agree return them and call me a list trust me I'm a difficult customer but I can't find anything bad about this product cudos to seller I'm disabled I depend a great deal on online buying and boy have I been burned but THIS is quite a find will never buy another set of sheets
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good price, good color
customer_reviews.text: These are very soft and that is what the kids wanted. I like a more sturdy cottony feel which these are not. Wash and dried without wrinkles. Nice touches-mattress elastic huggers on the corners to keep the bottom sheet in place, pocket ends on the pillow cases to keep the pillow from slipping out and sheet completely covers the mattress. I bought the twin set and there were two identical pillow cases, no sham.
customer_reviews.author: LJD

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: The set is very soft! It arrived late, but it doesn't bother me. Also the sheets and comforter is very dusty it has purple lint all over it maybe it was mixed with something else. I packed it back up. The sheets say twin XL but the comforter say twin so I'm not sure if the comforter will fit on my dorm bed. We'll see. The twin XL set comes with a flat sheet, fitted sheet, 2 standard pillow cases, and a comforter for anyone wondering.
customer_reviews.author: Tirawraw

customer_reviews.title: 5 Piece Comforter Set Bag
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this product. Just be aware that the comforter is not meant for the fall or winter season. It's not that thick. But it's good for spring or summer use. Also, comforter that appeared in the picture is not exactly the same in person. It's thinner.
customer_reviews.author: Eris Mom

customer_reviews.title: So cozy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself having low expectations for the price point. (As typical sets usually cost $100-$200 depending on the brand. By far the greatest set I have ever felt. It's ventilating so it keeps you warm but keeps the temperature controlled as it does dissipate heat. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: T. Benavides

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price point. Strongly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I wasnt expecting them to have such high quality. I bought it as a temporary set but I'm probably gonna keep them. They're very soft. The sheets are a 1500 thread count and very nice. They did however come covered in a bunch of white threads but that was more on an inconvenience than a problem, you just have to pick them off. The comforter is a little smaller than i imagined but it still fits on the bed fine
customer_reviews.author: Charles Blasini

customer_reviews.title: Sewing not good quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two comforter/sheet sets in the twin size, color denim. When I took them out of the package I washed them immediately. One comforter came out of the wash intact but the second comforter had a tear along the seam of about 5 inches and some of the stuffing came out in the wash. I was very pleased with the sheet sets as well as the color of the comforter however I was very disappointed that the sewing on the comforter was not of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Altoadventures

customer_reviews.title: 5 pieces, all match. Smiles
customer_reviews.text: No problems. Bought 2 Black sets for bunkbeds. My favorite part is that the fitted sheets have a thick piece of diagonal elastic to hold them on the mattress. The kids are sleeping beautifully. The price is great for the quality. Prime shipping as promised.
customer_reviews.author: JARRX4

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly as expected, which is a good thing. I bought the Twin size. I like the way the formed sheet wraps around the mattress really far and firmly with elastic so it stays in place. My old one always came off the corners from tossing and turning. I think it's a good deal for 40 bucks. I need to trim off the tags on the sheet and cover. They are big and in the way. Hard to find a twin set that isn't pink or decorated unicorn's or ninja turtles! I like the black.
customer_reviews.author: Lowell Crow

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy these! They are super soft out of the package and after washing too but the sheets are constantly balling up and it feels like crumbs in the bed. Have only had them a week and washed them twice and it keeps happening. Take your money somewhere else the quality here is terrible!! I threw away the packaging but would’ve sent them back! I don’t have $ to buy something else so my poor daughter is dealing with this for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Reece

customer_reviews.title: Soft and stays put.
customer_reviews.text: The material is very soft it feels very luxurious for the price there is some elastic straps that help it stay in place and it has not moved at all since we’ve owned it. Definitely buying again
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Didn't receive peices listed but pleased anyway
customer_reviews.text: I only received 5 pieces... comforter, fitted sheet, flat sheet and 2 pillow cases but it is super soft and very well made
customer_reviews.author: Mindi T

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set in white full size. It came with 4 pillow cases, fitted sheet, flat sheet, and blanket. For the price I'm happy with the quality. I haven't used it for long so who knows if it'll last but I'll be happy with even just 6 months daily use out of this. If you're looking for an affordable no fuss/no frills set I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: FunSizeShopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Received it today, packaged great and no odor to it. Super soft quality, stitching is nicely done and it is the perfect shade of eggplant purple which is exactly what I was wanting. Washed it immediately and the filling within the comforter did not ball up under the fabric like most do. None of the stitching came out after wash/dry either. Very happy with this purchase. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Flo B.

customer_reviews.title: These are much better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping for a cheap second set of bedding for my guest bed but honestly the sheets and the comforter are so soft, I ended up putting them on my bed and giving my guests my old set. The fitted sheet was able to fit over my 12 inch deep queen with no problem. The comforter is a nice weight for Southern California weather. Might need something heavier in a colder area but I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J.

customer_reviews.title: Comforter is HOT, fuzzies everywhere
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: the nights are getting colder & now I love the comforter. It’s super cozy. The synthetic fill in this comforter does not breathe at all. If it were winter I would probably like it, but it’s not. It’s hot. I can’t even use it, it’s in a cupboard. The sheet & pillow cases are fine. I bought the purple set & now there are purple fuzzies everywhere in my apartment, even after I washed it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: I won't buy any other brand
customer_reviews.text: My family loves these bedding sets. I have bought 7 sets for our beds in the last year and will plan to buy more as needed in the future. They are silky but not slippery, warm when it's cold and cool when it's hot. They are perfect and comfortable to sleep on after a long stressful day.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Sizing not right
customer_reviews.text: We have a queen size bed and this was suppose to measure 88x88 and it measures 84x84 so once side of the bed it covers to the top of the box springs the other side hardly hangs over the top side of the mattress. Very disappointed and it was soft and such a wonderful soft shade of yellow.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy J. Friend

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking and a Good Value
customer_reviews.text: A perfect set for a teenager, came with everything we needed. The sheets would be too thin for me, but my son is always hot and these sleep well for him. The comforter is lightweight and made well. Hopefully it will last a good while, but the price was great!
customer_reviews.author: HealthFitnessBeauty

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and soft
customer_reviews.text: Nice product and super soft! They washed perfectly and the aqua color is beautiful
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Good quality worth the money..
customer_reviews.text: for the money I spent on this bed in a bag for my granddaughter's bed, is absolutely wonderful every penny. she received top and bottom sheets, two pillow cases, and the bedspread. it is a nice quality & worth the money..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought five twin sets and we love them all
customer_reviews.text: I bought 5 sets of these twin sets in 3 different colors. They were all the same style and fabric. All monochrome, as I expected. The twin sets came with 2 pillow cases, which was perfect for us. These are priced perfectly for this mom on a budget (30ish dollars each), and actually very aesthetically pleasing for my designer self. So soft and comfy too.
customer_reviews.author: N. Ship

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had this sheet set for almost a year and a half and still love it. I love that the fitted sheet has sewn in elastic in the corners to keep the sheet in place! After 20+ washes the color has held up, the elastic still holds everything in place and they're almost as soft as they were they day I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Marci Coyne

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the full size gray. Beware that it does not come with shams, only 4 regular pillowcases. Also, the color of the sheet set and the comforter is completely different. Very dissatisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shevawn Swain

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Soft and cuddly. Keeps my daughter nice and warm. Perfect for her bed and it’s her favorite color.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Hobbins

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my little girls bunk beds and their bedding is nicer than mine! It a perfect pink for a little girl and I love how soft the sheets and comforter is, as well as how there is extra elastic in the corners of the fitted sheet to ensure it stays on. When I go to replace my set I’ll definitely be taking a look into this same setup in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen H

customer_reviews.title: light weight and did the job.
customer_reviews.text: I had a out of town guest coming and needed a new set. These fit the bill perfect. You can tell the quality might not be 100% and I dont expect the set to hold up for a long time with many washings, especially the comforter but they will be used in my guest room until then.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Lowder

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: Thin thin thin! I can actually see my mattress through the sheets. The stitching has become unraveled after 1 wash!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best Bed in a Bag sets I've bought, and the price is right too
customer_reviews.text: Everything came as advertised. All pieces were the correct color and size and were free of any imperfections. I'm only slightly disappointed in how thin the comforter is but that's more of a nit pick than an actual issue.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set for an affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical to buy these when I saw all the negative reviews. I’m glad I decided to follow my mind and buy them. I bought two sets of these sheets for my kids bunk beds. They are sooooo soft. The quality is exceptional for the price. I have washed the sheets at least 3 times and they are still in the same condition. I honestly have no complaints. I would highly recommend them if you’re looking for a nice set for an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Nisha

customer_reviews.title: color does not match picture
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Aqua color twin & the color is more a light blue instead of Aqua. Does not match decor of the room. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Vallely

customer_reviews.title: Nice fabric, overall great quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a Full set. Really rich and pretty color, comforter is soft and nice looking. Kids have been laying on their beds a lot due to no school. Most of the wrinkles shake out of the comforter. Washes easy, does take a bit of extra time in the dryer, but no more than any other comforter. We purchased the teal color and had no color bleed, but the dark purple did have a bit of color come off in the first wash. Still very rich color and nice look. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn White

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: True to color, and very lightweight , but smaller than pictured. Luckily, i bought this for a bunk bed so it suits me fine, but the comfort just covers the matress. The picture must be a size up. The matress i was covering is 6-8 inches, and it fit very well, so I'd say this set runs small, fyi
customer_reviews.author: TeacupDiluded

customer_reviews.title: So much more than what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Needed a cheap "bed in a bag" for my firefighter hubby to take to work. I opened this up not expecting much and holy cow!! It is SO soft I am thinking of ordering one for the house! Great price and excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Harold

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price. Color, not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Wrinkles easily if it's crowded in the dryer and you don't take out when hot. Very soft and plush. Lots of filling in the comforter for the price! But it's more green than gray. I specifically ordered gray because I felt black would be too overpowering for what I was going for. I would return and order black, but it would probably be too much in the other extreme. Will keep, but I'm ordering something else to be my everyday comforter. Probably won't buy again, just out of concern that I wouldn't be satisfied with the color.
customer_reviews.author: Elite Tech Services

customer_reviews.title: Very soft, wrong color
customer_reviews.text: This came in a shade of blue that should never be described as “navy” it’s not navy. However, it’s so soft I decided to keep it anyways. The sheets are equally soft. There are some fuzz balls around my room, I’m curious as to how it washes. For now, I’m happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Smart buy...
customer_reviews.text: Great color. You know how some bed in a bag 7 pieces that you buy the color is faded... NOT THIS BRAND! The color you see online is the deep, rich color that you receive. Great buy. I'm in love...
customer_reviews.author: Karen L.

customer_reviews.title: Just got it
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today and ended up washing it twice due to my cat dirtying it up in the laundry room. Comforter is still in one piece so there's that. The color is pretty accurate (I got navy blue)
customer_reviews.author: Roni

customer_reviews.title: Very soft, but unraveling.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boys twin beds. It’s super SOFT. We live in Oklahoma so it’s geat for winter, but it is a little heavy for the warmer weather. My ONLY complaint is that BOTH comforters we bought have started to unravel at the seams on the corners so I have had to sew them up.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Soft Deep sheet set.
customer_reviews.text: This Sheet set is very soft. It has the deep pockets in the fitted sheets so they stay on your bed. these sheet wash up well. and sleep well too. the pillow case covers will fit bigger pillows . The softness of the sheet makes your bed a waiting to jump into comfort jump on in and sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Christy St.Germaine

customer_reviews.title: Simple and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Easy delivery and everything in the package! Loving the simple but sturdy design. Washed the sheets and pillow cases before placing on bed and everything came out in tact and not discolored. Solid buy to have some extra linens.
customer_reviews.author: Ritesh Shah

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid that this set was going to feel like burlap. It's great, it's soft and we got the baby blue and the color matched to what was in the listing. The price is great for what you get (twin - 2 pillow cases, top sheet, bottom sheet and comforter). Definitely worth the money paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: JAZ

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 for my boys beds. The comforter is nice and I bought matching curtains.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of the best bed in a bag bargains I've found for a while. And bonus, the sheets have straps sewn into them to keep them placed on the bed (big plus for me being the mother of a bouncing toddler).
customer_reviews.author: Karyn

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most comfortable sheet sets I’ve owned. Will by again. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: College Fit
customer_reviews.text: This was for an upcoming college student. He was thrilled about this purchase. The colors were exactly what he wanted. We both was pleased with everything. Shipping and the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Kepkim

customer_reviews.title: Big red dot stained right in the center of the comforter.
customer_reviews.text: Big red dot on the comforter. I really liked this until I noticed a big red dot right in the center of the conforter. Way disappointed, I am not sure if I should return it or try and get the stain out.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft, Fits Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and comfortable! Really well made and the corners stay put and will not pop off! I'm on love with this bedding and I will be buying more from this company, absolutely fantastic and quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate description
customer_reviews.text: Only 5 pieces in the bed-in-bag for twin. Title description says 7. Picked because description said 7.
customer_reviews.author: Darhl Edwards

customer_reviews.title: They are beginning to bead after a few washes.
customer_reviews.text: After a few washes, they are beginning to bead up,which is the nightmare too comfortable sheets. They look nice, feel nice, and maybe a little pricey, but the beading is very, very, very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Lionell

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: Omg god i love this so much. I was scared at first to purchase because of the reviews but when i received it i just fell in love.. very soft, i washed it and it didnt fall apart like what others stated in their reviews
customer_reviews.author: Jodia

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pieces
customer_reviews.text: I took the pillowcases out of my cart because this description said it comes with (2) standard Pillowcases. It also says it on the packaging. However, as you can see - ZERO pillowcases, only a fitted sheet, flat sheet, and comforter was included in the "bed in a bag". Now I have to run out and buy pillowcases so my guest can have a complete bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy but...:
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my son’s bed, unfortunately only had it a few weeks and the comforter has started to slit in a seen and stuffing shows. Otherwise we love the set, great value for 1 great price. Working on a replacement with seller now.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Black

customer_reviews.title: Where is the fitted sheet?
customer_reviews.text: Washed upon arrival. DOES NOT INCLUDE A FITTED SHEET!!!!!! Very annoying. Come with two pillow cases, cover, top sheet and that’s it! Now I have to by a fitted sheet that will not match my cover set.
customer_reviews.author: B.Martin

customer_reviews.title: Beyond expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I got this comforter to go with a duvet set I bought my son. The first things I noticed when taking it out of the package was how soft and wrinkle free it was. Even after being washed and hung on the line, it was still wrinkle free and soft. When I went to put it on his bed, I noticed the elastic through the seam, it made putting it on the bed a breeze and even many days of my son jumping on the bed, rolling around and getting the dog to jump in his bed, it hasn’t once attempted to come off.
customer_reviews.author: Kassadee Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Looks used
customer_reviews.text: Received product, looks like there is oil spots and chocolate on it, tags ripped, looks used! I’ll be returning this
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg it’s so soft! My boys should sleep good tonight! Update..I loved my boys set so much I ordered a Queen for me and I am kinda disappointed because the twin blanket is much heavier and fluffy the queen blanket was wayyy thinner.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique C

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: I brought this set by mistake But I LOVE It so I didn't send it back it is a beautiful color blue and soft and washes great I would give it a try you will fall in love with it like I did highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Hingham

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Will definitely purchase again if needed or for a color change!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something inexpensive for the daybed in my nursery that if ruined accidentally I wouldn’t be as frustrated. The color is perfect! Perfect shade of light gray/silver, doesn’t darken the room. We have yet to sleep on the sheets but they are soft to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleasantly surprised with this bedding set!! Everything is soft and smooth. The comforter is very fluffy and light weight seeming, but VERY warm! I’ve washed it a few times, following instructions to dry it with tennis balls or dryer balls, and it’s still warm and fluffy. Color is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this product.
customer_reviews.text: This just arrived today. The description says "Sheet sets have Deep pockets designed to fit mattresses up to 16deep". Unfortunately that's not even close to accurate and in an attempt to lightly pull the sheet down it ripped. Unfortunately we'll be returning this product. In addition, the main description says this item comes with 2 pillow shams which it does not. It comes with 4 pillow cases.
customer_reviews.author: Shellie H.

customer_reviews.title: not really grey
customer_reviews.text: We like the sheets but they look more olive than grey. Not a true grey, there is definitely a strong green tone, we ordered a twin and full size. Disappointing, may return.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: 1 order was good the other order looked like it was burned in the factory?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these for both of my kid's rooms. Washed the comforters on. Delicate Cycle. When the was finished I took 1 out and stuffing was everywhere. Once I took the comforter out of the wash I noticed a huge line of whatook like is burn Marks that may have happened in the factory while being made. I bought 2 and washed the other one the exact same way and it was perfect and nothing was wrong with it. I am extremely bummed out
customer_reviews.author: Chipper

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Basic, Light Weight, worth the price
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for ... but this slightly exceeds expectations. Have bought 3 different sets of tbis brand for our family. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Married Female 40, 3 kids 20 15 2

customer_reviews.title: Color is not the same as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not the color in the pictures it’s way brighter more like a bright sunshine yellow or like 💛. It’s light weight, thin but comfortable. I’m just upset the color isn’t like the picture that’s why I gave it two stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: It’s not gray!
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited for getting such a good deal and I had envisioned my new room to be a gray and white color. Before ordering I read reviews and everyone was really content with their set plus it was such a good deal... however when I received the set it almost looks like an olive green! I thought maybe it was just me but no the color is way off. I’m pretty disappointed that it wasn’t gray.
customer_reviews.author: Maryam Roya Jailli

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Great comforter set. Love the deep rich color that hasn't faded yet after 3 washings. The sheets and soft and fit snugly. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KIM KELSEY

customer_reviews.title: Blue? Black? Supposed to be black
customer_reviews.text: We had one problem when we got them out of the box. The comforter looks blue compared to the black sheets. Then hold the comforter up in a different light, different angle and you get more black but not like the sheets. My son is ok with them though.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Alford

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, one for my daughter and son-they are two and one years old. They are so soft and lightweight, but warm enough for them not to wake up sweaty. The only thing I don’t like is when I washed them (brand new, hadn’t been slept on) some of the batting (filling) had shifted just a little. Next time I’ll just throw a tennis ball in the dryer with the comforter. Overall not a bad purchase and I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a single nights use
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even get to use it. I washed and dried it and when I took out the comforter the stuffing was pulled through the fabric in several spots and one spot was burnt. I've dried other comforters in the same dryer without any issues. I don't recommend anyone buy this product, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Oh

customer_reviews.title: Soft but colors don’t match
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t cost much and is very soft but the sheets and comforter are two different brands and not the same shade. It will do for my guest room since I’m adding quilts to it.
customer_reviews.author: Carole H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are super soft. The comforter is warm. Fast shipping and good price.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why this product has so many mixed reviews. I bought it for my queen sized bed in the color black and I love it. Mines came with all pieces attached & it does have great warmth to it. I havent washed it yet. But i would say i don't think it'll last forever. Im sure ill get a few months use out of it and I'm fine with that
customer_reviews.author: Brea

customer_reviews.title: Softness
customer_reviews.text: Super soft material! Nice color. Sheets aren’t thick nor thin they are just perfect. Does not wrinkle easily. Haven’t washed these yet so I’m not sure about the durability just yet.
customer_reviews.author: Misty B Stone

customer_reviews.title: Not large enough
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a queen size set, the sheets are a perfect fit but the spread fits like a full size spread barely goes around the bed. It’s a nice looking spring/summer cover but I wouldn’t purchase as bedroom decor.
customer_reviews.author: Spechellk

product_meta.title: Sweet Home Collection 7 Piece Bed-In-A-Bag Solid Color Comforter & Sheet Set, Full, Gray
product_meta.description: Size:Full| Color:GraySweet Home Collection - 100Percent polyester microfiber & down alternative comforter and sheet set. With the set you will get a 100Percent polyester microfiber & down alternative comforter and a gorgeous sheet set that will dress up your bed without breaking the bank. In ultra soft microfiber materials and gorgeous bold colors, this set is going to ensure your room is fashionably decorated and ready to show off! all products are brand new factory sealed from the manufacturer. Our luxurious, premium bed in a bag set is a great gift idea for all holidays. Surprise your loved ones with the comfort and relaxation that they deserve. Set includes 1 comforter, 1 flat sheet, 1 fitted sheet, and four pillowcases (note twin size only includes 2 pillow cases)
feature_bullets: Luxury Goose down-alternative comforter for year round with advanced box stitching design
Premium Quality comforter that is lightweight while providing balanced warmth
Sheet sets have Deep pockets designed to fit mattresses up to 16deep
Full Size: comforter: 78x 88, fitted sheet: 54x 75, flat sheet: 81x 96, 4 pillowcases: 20x 30Each
Care instructions: machine wash gentle cycle with cold water, sun dry or low tumble dry, washable for many years

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars4,106 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
